# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="041ac-102">Tlač e-mailov a kalendárov v Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="041ac-103">Tlač e-mailovej správy:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="041ac-104">Vyberte správu, ktorú chcete vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="041ac-105">V pravom hornom rohu správy vyberte tri bodky</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="041ac-106">a potom vyberte položku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="041ac-107">**Tlač**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="041ac-108">Tlač kalendára:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="041ac-109">V pravom hornom rohu stránky vyberte položku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="041ac-110">**Tlač**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="041ac-111">Vyberte zobrazenie a časový rozsah a vyberte položku **Tlačiť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="041ac-112">Ďalšie informácie o [tlači e-mailov a kalendárov v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="041ac-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
